pr_title: Use the super bucket key when resolving which RPC target to use to ha…

timeline.message: Use the super bucket key when resolving which RPC target to use to handle a command.

timeline.bodyText: Should this be inline to avoid potential of causing duplicate definition errors? Could also be noexcept
timeline.author: vekterli
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@

+#pragma once
+
+#include <vespa/document/bucket/bucketid.h>
+#include <vespa/persistence/spi/bucket_limits.h>
+#include <cassert>
+
+namespace storage {
+
+/**
+ * Returns the super bucket key of the given bucket id key based on the minimum used bits allowed.
+ */
+uint64_t get_super_bucket_key(const document::BucketId& bucket_id) {
